Title: Matinee
Writer: Jerico Stone (story), Charles S. Haas (story), Charles S. Haas (screenplay)
Actors: John Goodman, Cathy Moriarty, Simon Fenton, Omri Katz
Plot: A showman introduces a small coastal town to a unique movie experience and capitalises on the Cuban Missile crisis hysteria with a kitschy horror extravaganza combining film effects, stage props and actors in rubber suits in this salute to the B-movie.
